title: To all the "Stoned" people out there that insist on telling the world.
body:
Just play the game.
no one cares that you smoke weed.

replies.body: I wish there was a report button for substance abuse.

> [{quoted}](name=Teslablade,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=baAkiABl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-06T16:13:07.810+0000)
>
> I wish there was a report button for substance abuse.

Please riot

In all seriousness, I don't want them to use abuse the drug, it has been proven to do hazardous things to the human body; such as stop complete function in the body unless/until you get the drug out of your lungs due to the overdoes. (I am also worried about what vapes might do, as it took years to learn what cigarets do, so vaping may cause a different but still scary event.) This coming from a kid who just doesn't think its right for someone to not care what happens to their body. You were given life, don't abuse it, you are allowed to smoke whatever but please don't hurt yourself in the process.

> [{quoted}](name=Rew711,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=baAkiABl,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-06T23:57:29.117+0000)
>
> In all seriousness, I don't want them to use abuse the drug, it has been proven to do hazardous things to the human body; such as stop complete function in the body unless/until you get the drug out of your lungs due to the overdoes. (I am also worried about what vapes might do, as it took years to learn what cigarets do, so vaping may cause a different but still scary event.) This coming from a kid who just doesn't think its right for someone to not care what happens to their body. You were given life, don't abuse it, you are allowed to smoke whatever but please don't hurt yourself in the process.

You have to live life to the fullest to enjoy it. Never forget that. You seem like the sheltered type who doesn't actually understand the world or the way it works so just a bit of advice: go have fun. Weed and booze are parts of life and they are fun! Be smart, but don't be cowardly. There is nothing wrong with these things in moderation. Use your brain. Also, there are 0 confirmed cases of marijuana overdose. Not sure where you're getting that information.
Yeah because having fun and damaging my life is way more important than not trying things because they're "fun"

it isnt going to hurt you or damage you to try alcohol or marijuana. Becoming addicted and drinking and smoking/whatever in excess is different. Trying them once is actually something I would recommend, It is not in any way a bad thing to understand what they are and how they affect you. I personally have tried Marijuana on a few occasions, I found it just wasnt for me, but I am  glad I at least tried it. I say that for many reasons, one of the bigger is that I can not be pressured into it now, I have tried it and thanks to that experience have formed an educated opinion based on it.

Now the try it once idea does not work for everything. There are many drugs out there that can do irreparable harm to you even after a single use. That is why it is good to know what you are getting into, do a little research on something first before doing anything extremely dangerous. Same goes for marijuana, do a little research, just make sure your sources are not propaganda and falsified. I can tell you though, trying alcohol or marijuana once will not harm you in any way... unless you do something really stupid after using them but that is on you if you went overboard. Oh yeah and it doesnt hurt to do it with a friend that is a little more experienced with it as it is much safer then.

> [{quoted}](name=Jingerbeardman,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=baAkiABl,comment-id=000000000000000400000000,timestamp=2015-10-07T01:04:57.255+0000)
>
unless you do something really stupid after using them but that is on you if you went overboard.


You just said one reason why it is stupid, most drugs affect the mind and can cause extreme brain damage and make you do stupid things WHICH is why they are dangerous. In fact the general public is misinformed on the effects of it. It can cause extreme neurological nerve damage in certain parts of the brain and change your entire attitude. Have you heard of the story of a doctor who took one small dose of heroin, and the next day he was in a coma for the next 16 years? He woke up and didn't remember anything. Literally nothing. He was a baby again. 

There ARE risks, if you want me to go into detail, you can fite me. Or downvote me because drugs are #mlg420noscopeswegsmokeweedeveryday

This is the most 'highschool kid' comment I've ever seen. I smoke weed daily, but I honestly don't need to explain why. Because you have a bad disease called, stop being a controlling and judgmental lunatic. I have enough money to smoke daily, keep my family happy, and live a pretty good lifestyle. That's all you should know and care about.

And yours is the most "pot smoking college kid" comment ive ever seen. Not all drugs are as harmless as marijuana. 

Look up fentanyl (a synthesized opiate). In comparison, straight heroin (a grown opiate) isnt even seen as a problem. Per weight its something like 50 times stronger than heroin -  Ive heard that .1mg of fentanyl is as strong as 5 mg of heroin. One puff of heroin wont kill you. One puff of fentanyl will. And since dealers are cutting their heroin with the cheaper, more potent fentanyl, its impossible for users to know how much is too much.
I wish people had to pass a drug test before they could queue for ranked!
poor thing, you think riot isn't stoned out of their minds every time they try to balance riven or vayne?

That isn't the problem.The problem is that players tell it to everyone when in reality they are 1. A kid trying to sound cool or 2. Using it as an excuse when they do poorly 3.If they do well they say that they're stoned and still better.They're not always like this but if they announce it most likely what I said. Same goes for people who say they are drunk also.
Most upvotes I've ever had.
http://cdn.meme.am/instances/56473010.jpg

To everyone who doesn't smoke weed:

We're not all retarded, disgusting, dread-sporting stoner burnouts.
Some of us use it for medical purposes and some of us use it recreationally, some of us even have jobs and go to school! (Hi)

Playing league while high is a stupid thing to do if you expect to win, and please remember that if someone goes "LOL so highhh xDD" in chat, then you should probably come to the conclusion that they're an idiot or very young anyway and would likely do the same thing if they were drinking or using any other substance. 

Also, can you not jump on us at every opportunity you get? If i die to Gromp and our top laner asks "what happened" and i reply "haha sorry a bit stoned" this is not some proclamation of my intent to legalize weed all over the nation. It's a simple answer to a simple question. I'm not trying to be "cool" or "edgy" by saying that i smoke weed. You asked, so i'm answering your question. There's no need to mash your shift key as quickly as you can to type "OOOH U SMOKE WEED YEAH UR COOL 420 BLAZE IT AM I RITE". I'm not going to go out of my way to lie and type some other excuse about armor runes and smite cooldowns just because you want to call me out on what you view as a poor life choice and make yourself feel better by berating me about it.

If im playing normals and not being an obnoxious dick about it, then why bust my balls man. Neat observation based on personal experience: There are more people going "WEED LMAO" sarcastically than there are people who genuinely think like that, ironically. 

:)

Why are you getting so defensive?

He never said he have anything against smoking weed or even playing while stoned (nor did he ever insult anyone). He was only stating that he's tired of players that insist to tell everyone that they smoke weed. Because let's be honest - the amount of players that go out of their way just to type "I'm so high lol" is absurd right now. I am sick of it as well - and no, I don't ask them anything. They just feel the urge to tell me how high they are for no reason at all.

> [{quoted}](name=IronSolariLeona,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=baAkiABl,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-10-06T18:46:40.565+0000)
>
> To everyone who doesn't smoke weed:
> 
> We're not all retarded, disgusting, dread-sporting stoner burnouts.
> Some of us use it for medical purposes and some of us use it recreationally, some of us even have jobs and go to school! (Hi)
> 
> Playing league while high is a stupid thing to do if you expect to win, and please remember that if someone goes "LOL so highhh xDD" in chat, then you should probably come to the conclusion that they're an idiot or very young anyway and would likely do the same thing if they were drinking or using any other substance. 
> 
> Also, can you not jump on us at every opportunity you get? If i die to Gromp and our top laner asks "what happened" and i reply "haha sorry a bit stoned" this is not some proclamation of my intent to legalize weed all over the nation. It's a simple answer to a simple question. I'm not trying to be "cool" or "edgy" by saying that i smoke weed. You asked, so i'm answering your question. There's no need to mash your shift key as quickly as you can to type "OOOH U SMOKE WEED YEAH UR COOL 420 BLAZE IT AM I RITE". I'm not going to go out of my way to lie and type some other excuse about armor runes and smite cooldowns just because you want to call me out on what you view as a poor life choice and make yourself feel better by berating me about it.
> 
> If im playing normals and not being an obnoxious dick about it, then why bust my balls man. Neat observation based on personal experience: There are more people going "WEED LMAO" sarcastically than there are people who genuinely think like that, ironically. 
> 
> :)

Who say's I don't smoke weed ;)

Okay. I've never done any drugs before, nor any alcohol. But in my opinion, to get to your point "Also, can you not jump on us at every opportunity you get? If i die to Gromp and our top laner asks "what happened" and i reply "haha sorry a bit stoned", thats exactly what ItBurnWhenIP meant, no one cares if you're stoned. To elaborate on MY point, justifying your mistake with "haha sorry a bit stoned", is somewhat of a stupid excuse. If you're going to smoke weed, you know the consequences, you know what could/can/will happen, atleast you should, so how can you justify anything with "I'm stoned", the only way of justifying a mistake you made while you were stoned is, "I'm a careless selfish prick". Now don't get me wrong, I'm not generalizing everyone who smokes weed as a "careless selfish prick", but those, who justify their actions by saying "I'm stoned". 

My tip would be, listen to "stoner" music with friends, or watch a fcked up movie with lots of colors and idek, or w/e, but please, don't ruin League Players fun, or hurt anyone in your surroundings with you being careless.
 
That's my opinion. I don't know if that makes sense to anyone but me, but hey. Here's a light. 
{{summoner:14}}

You shouldn't be playing league high or drunk even if it is normals. Why should my ability to have fun and chances to win be lowered because you want to be high? If you form your own team and play that's all fine, but this idea that "normals mean I can just fuck around because it doesn't matter" is annoying as shit. Mistakes happen and shit pops up but purposing impairing yourself without giving rats ass about the 4 people your screwing over makes you a dick. Every time.
Speak up, bud, can't hear you all the way up on that high horse ;)

I don't give a rats ass if someone smokes pot. My problem lies in the fact if affects decision making which is a big part of the game. Which means that 4 people have to deal with a bad game because you couldn't smoke afterwards.

Jax: "I'm so hiiiiigh!"

 Proceeds to die 6 times in 10 minutes and afks in base.

His duo partner: "Sorry guys he's passed out."

-- My Promotionals.
i lold hard irl

I wish that they would legalize marijuana


Just so stoners would have nothing to talk about
Right, because nobody talks about drinking even though it's legal.

> [{quoted}](name=Remlap1223,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=baAkiABl,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-10-06T18:51:06.285+0000)
>
> Right, because nobody talks about drinking even though it's legal.

It  has nothing to do with it being legal or not, but I rarely ever see people type, "haha I'm so drunk now" but I do see "I'm so high" or "I'm so stoned right now" almost every weekend.

Uh what?  I've seen it as equally as often.  And I rarely see either.  And if I do, I ignore it for the most part, unless they're being obnoxious about it, which I've never experienced.

This isn't a case of verbal abuse.  If they're annoying you that much, mute and move on.  I've blocked tons of players who are completely sober who are obnoxious, but don't report them because they haven't done anything wrong other than just annoy me.

It's fine to not like/want to smoke weed or drink, but you have no right to judge people who do, and you have even less of a right to ask them to get banned for it.

> [{quoted}](name=Remlap1223,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=baAkiABl,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-06T19:03:00.370+0000)
>
> Uh what?  I've seen it as equally as often.  And I rarely see either.  And if I do, I ignore it for the most part, unless they're being obnoxious about it, which I've never experienced.
> 
> This isn't a case of verbal abuse.  If they're annoying you that much, mute and move on.  I've blocked tons of players who are completely sober who are obnoxious, but don't report them because they haven't done anything wrong other than just annoy me.
> 
> It's fine to not like/want to smoke weed or drink, but you have no right to judge people who do, and you have even less of a right to ask them to get banned for it.

I don't want them banned, I'm just saying it is kind of annoying and immature to go around talking about how drunk or high you are.
Someone listens to a lot of Daniel Tosh

> [{quoted}](name=Fanushkah,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=baAkiABl,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-10-07T01:28:18.477+0000)
>
> Someone listens to a lot of Daniel Tosh

Just enough to remind myself I have a sense of humor
most of time it's probably just kids trying to pretend to be stoned to seem cool

How about you just stop smoking weed.

Let the downvotes begin.
Implying that getting drunk is any better? Statistically, alcohol is more dangerous than marijuana

I don't recall him implying drinking was any better. And statistically, doing either is more dangerous than not.. Unless using them for medical purposes. (Which still pose risks) I could honestly not care how much weed you smoke or how much you drink. It's your life to live or "live" if you consider that living. Just don't screw with my game and I'm happy.

Also upvoted.

> [{quoted}](name=ItBurnWhenIP,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=baAkiABl,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-10-06T15:47:57.668+0000)
>
> no one cares about you

http://pre14.deviantart.net/1226/th/pre/f/2015/148/0/5/sad_pepe__feels_bad_man__vector_by_hirussai-d8uq43y.png

When im drunk i tell everyone that i am drunk, that way they know why i am playing badly if i am or why i make bad decisions. Yea i shouldn't play while im drunk i know that when im sober, but when im drunk all logic goes out the door lol.  

Also last time i was drunk i went like 24/11 as Talon mid
last time i played drunk i went 11-0-8 as kha jg, im better drunk than sober tbh
Last time i was drunk i went 37387/0/1 as ap ashe top in diamond elo

http://gaggif.com/albums/userpics/2013y/06/09/20/1/37pS-gaggif.gif




...how did this thread get so political? Seriously i feel the same way when 1/10 games someone proclaims that they have to take a giant shit. Please stop telling me these things in chat.
How does this not have more upvotes?  It is so fuckin true!

I was playing so bad once that I had to say im drunk to cover how bad I was. My team just smiled and said its fine. 

Everything went better than expected.

Had a ranked game recently where in champ select a guy locked in yorick mid and said 

"Brb guys take your time lockin in. About to go light up a fat one. Ha haaaaaaaaaa. So stoned right now".

Yeah, I promptly dodged that game.

If you smoke weed, congrats for you. You have every right. But please don't play league of legends ranked stoned out of your mind. Normals still bad to do it in, but at least forgive able as it is just for practice. I don't care if you think you play better high of play high all the time. Just Don't.
{{champion:54}} <- He's always stoned!

I played stoned once, and I played drunk twice. And all three of those times I found myself feeling like an absolute sack of shit because I was absolutely worthless and dragging the team down. I don't do that anymore.
You sure are a bag of vices aren't you......

I play while high every night. my performance isn't hindered by the fact that i smoked a few bowls before playing. When i'm high i find i remember all the little things i need to be doing like looking at the map constantly. warding more. and just bettering my positioning.
{{item:3070}} {{champion:54}} {{item:3070}}      B-But I AM stone

To all the "Not Caring" people out there that insist on telling the world:

Just reply to other things.
no one cares that you don't care that we smoke weed.

Personally I wish they'd put a hard ban on Weed to where It get's a life sentence from 16+, straight from juvenile right to the big house. Because I'm sick of weed and the effects it's had on my peers, my friends and my family. People always say it isn't addictive, or it doesn't have any negative effects like other drugs are turning a blind eye to the fact that it is Illegal, once you start smoking it you are admitting to yourself that you are a criminal, you can't pass drug test now, so you can't get a job and if you already have a job if they spring a drug test on you at 'random' because you reek of 'loud' you're fucked. Either that or you ask a younger relative, or someone you know that doesn't do drugs to cop you out, which morally is more disgusting than having said relative pee ON you. They shouldn't have to lie for you.

I'm an honest working man, but I don't have the best job, I don't make a lot of money, and I dont have a lot of things. My computer can barely keep 40 fps in a team fight on low settings. I got college debts up to my knees, and my mom with her drug history and my dad with his health problems are not only not together, but are having a general hard time in life while I just watch because I hardly have enough money to keep myself afloat. I live in a low-income neighborhood with crime and violence happening all around me and to top it all off, I'm just this unattractive guy, I'm not fat or anything I just don't look like a famous rapper or actor, no chiseled chin or 6 pack abs. The Point I'm trying to make is that drugs don't make it any easier, and every penny you spend on drugs goes to some fat druglord when it could be going to someone who deserves it: You.

Great wife, job, kids, lifestyle, and hey look at that; even got a bachelor's degree. I smoke a lot a day, and I don't spend more than $100 a year on gardening supplies. I also live in CA so that helps.

Your peers, friends, and family needed help and you want to throw them in jail FOR LIFE. Great plan there.
